revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Logitech |model=Harmony Link |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B005O81U8Y |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/03/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=discontinued |type=WiFi IR bridge,IoT |fcc_id=TOB-OR0003 |ic_id=1807E-OR0003 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B,, barrel |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=i.MX253;(MCIMX253DJM4A); |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QG-HCE6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:04:20 }} '''WiFi IR bridge''' :{{SupportPage|http://www.logitech.com/en-us/support/harmony-link}}
There are six IR emitters on the PCB.
The FCC EUT is labeled with an OUI of 00:04:20.
The RAM chip would appear to be model K4T51163QG-HCE6 (512Mb/64MB).
==Probably used PSUs== A '''AD631MC''' power supply is shown bundled with the device in the FCC photos.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=PI Electronics |model=AD631MC (A/S: 82-31-998-6300) |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.13 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5.15 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |output_c=DC }}
==External links== *[http://www.avsforum.com/t/1451378/harmony-link-how-to-access-the-serial-console-tutorial-inside ''Harmony Link: How to access the serial console (tutorial inside)'' on '''avsforum''']
